name: Shooty Ball
description:
"Shooty Ball" is a some sort of a mix of an arkanoid and a twin stick shooter.  The concept of that project came to my mind quite spontaneously and i think the final product turned out to be a pretty nice game. 

Your only objective is to gain as many points as possible by killing enemies and not letting the ball fall. The ball changes its direction randomly after hitting the platform.

Tracks i used:

Rolemusic - Improvisation at lover's cavern

Rolemusic - Neoishiki

Multifaros - The Staff

Azureflux - Reckless

Hope you enjoy the game!
